idAction.title: Action ID
idAction.description: The ID that identifies an action on the board

idCard.title: Card ID
idCard.description: The ID that identifies card on the board

idChecklist.title: Checklist ID
idChecklist.description: The ID that identifies a checklist on the board

idLabel.title: Label ID
idLabel.description: The ID that identifies a label on the board

idList.title: List ID
idList.description: The ID that identifies a list on the board

idMember.title: Member ID
idMember.description: The ID that identifies a member of the board

idNotification.title: Notification ID
idNotification.description: The ID that identifies a notification for the board

idOrganization.title: Team ID
idOrganization.description: The ID that identifies a Trello team or organization

id.title: Board ID
id.description: The ID that identifies a Trello board

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the Trello board

desc.title: Description
desc.description: The description of the Trello board

closed.title: Closed
closed.description: Specifies whether the Trello board is closed

pinned.title: Pinned
pinned.description: Specifies whether the board is pinned to the header menu in Trello

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL of the Trello board

shortUrl.title: Short URL
shortUrl.description: The short URL of the Trello board

prefs_permissionLevel.title: Permission level
prefs_permissionLevel.description: Specifies the permissions for the board

prefs_voting.title: Voting preferences
prefs_voting.description: Specifies whether voting is enabled for the board

prefs_comments.title: Comments preferences
prefs_comments.description: Specifies whether commenting is enabled for the board

prefs_invitations.title: Invitations preferences
prefs_invitations.description: Specifies the preferences for inviting members to access the board

prefs_selfJoin.title: Self join preferences
prefs_selfJoin.description: Specifies whether team members can join the board without being invited

prefs_cardCovers.title: Card covers preferences
prefs_cardCovers.description: Specifies whether images can be added to the front of cards on the board

prefs_background.title: Background preferences
prefs_background.description: Specifies the preferences for changing the background of a board

prefs_cardAging.title: Card aging preferences
prefs_cardAging.description: Specifies whether card aging is enabled for the board so that cards that haven't been accessed for a while change visually

permissionLevel.title: Permission level preferences
permissionLevel.description: Specifies who can access the board, whether it's private, public, or accessible to a org

voting.title: Voting preferences
voting.description: Specifies who can vote on this board; values can be 'disabled', 'members', 'observers', 'team', or 'public'

comments.title: Comments preferences
comments.description: Specifies who can comment on this board; values are disabled, members, observers, a team, or public

invitations.title: Invitations preferences
invitations.description: Specifies who can invite members to a board, whether it's admins or members

selfJoin.title: Self join preferences
selfJoin.description: Specifies whether team members can join the board without being invited; values are 'true' or 'false'

cardCovers.title: Card covers preferences
cardCovers.description: Specifies whether card cover images are enabled; values are 'true' or 'false'

cardAging.title: Card aging preferences
cardAging.description: Specifies whether pirate or regular mode is enabled for card aging

calendarFeedEnabled.title: Calendar feed enabled preferences
calendarFeedEnabled.description: Specifies whether the calendar feed options is enabled; values are 'true' or 'false'

background.title: Background preferences
background.description: Specifies the board background; values are the name of a standard background or the ID of a custom background

backgroundImage.title: Background image preferences
backgroundImage.description: Specifies a background image for the board

backgroundImageScaled.title: Background image scaled preferences
backgroundImageScaled.description: Specifies a scaled background image for the board

backgroundTile.title: Background tile preferences
backgroundTile.description: Specifies a background tile for the board

backgroundBrightness.title: Background brightness preferences
backgroundBrightness.description: Specifies the brightness of the board background

backgroundColor.title: Background color preferences
backgroundColor.description: Specifies the color of the background of the board

canBePublic.title: Can be public preferences
canBePublic.description: Specifies whether the board is public

canBeOrg.title: Can be org preferences
canBeOrg.description: Specifies whether the board is visible to members of a team

canBePrivate.title: Can be private preferences
canBePrivate.description: Specifies whether the board is private

canInvite.title: Can invite preferences
canInvite.description: Specifies whether members can be invited to join the board

labelNames.title: Label names
labelNames.description: The names of labels that you can add to a board

invitations.title: Invitations
invitations.description: Specifies whether admins or members can invite members to join a board

id.title: ID
id.description: The ID that identifies a member of the board

idMember.title: Member ID
idMember.description: The ID that identifies a member of the board

memberType.title: Member Type
memberType.description: The type of member of a Trello board

unconfirmed.title: Unconfirmed
unconfirmed.description: Specifies whether the board member is unconfirmed

deactivated.title: Deactivated
deactivated.description: Specifies whether the board member is deactivated

shortLink.title: Short Link
shortLink.description: The short link to the board

dateLastActivity.title: Last activity date
dateLastActivity.description: The date of the last activity on the board

dateLastView.title: Last view date
dateLastView.description: The date when the board was last viewed

starred.title: Starred
starred.description: Specifies whether the board is starred so that it appears at the top of your boards page
